data.comment: Today's referee, Byung jin Park, has blown to start the match.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
In the minute 2, Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Byung jin Park signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
In the minute 3, Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Pohang Steelers drive upfield and Aleksandar Palocevic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ulsan Hyundai defender.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Pohang Steelers pushes forward through Kwon Wan-kyu, whose finish on goal is saved.
Byung jin Park signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
In the minute 9, Brandon O'Neill returns to the field for Pohang Steelers after picking up a slight injury.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Ulsan to check on Brandon O'Neill, who is grimacing with pain.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half?
Bjorn Johnsen of Ulsan Hyundai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Kim In-sung for Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
In the minute 12, Byung jin Park awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 14, Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Ulsan.
In the minute 19, Aleksandar Palocevic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Pohang Steelers's Shim Dong-un misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 20, Byung jin Park awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half?
Ulsan Hyundai push forward at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium and Bjorn Johnsen gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Pohang Steelers defence.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 24, Ulsan Hyundai attack but Sin Jin-ho's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
In the minute 25, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
At Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium, Ha Chang-rae has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 33, In Ulsan, Sin Jin-ho of Ulsan Hyundai is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 35, Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Pohang Steelers.
Byung jin Park awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Ulsan Hyundai have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 42, Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Ball safe as Pohang Steelers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai's Koh Myeong-jin gets in a shot on goal at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Byung jin Park will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Byung jin Park blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Go Young-jun is replacing Brandon O'Neill for the away team.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Byung jin Park signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Pohang Steelers's half.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Ulsan Hyundai have got their heads in front thanks to a Kim In-sung strike.
In the minute 53, Hong Chul with an assist there.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
It's now 2-0 in Ulsan as Bjorn Johnsen scores for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 56, Great play from Sin Jin-ho to set up the goal.
Free kick Pohang Steelers.
Jeon Min-kwang is replacing Kwon Wan-kyu for Pohang Steelers at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 59, Ulsan Hyundai's Koh Myeong-jin has been booked in Ulsan.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
In the minute 64, In Ulsan Pohang Steelers attack through Jeon Min-kwang. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 68, Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 70, Pohang Steelers's Stanislav Iljutcenko breaks free at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 75, Kim Do-Hoon (Ulsan Hyundai) is making a first substitution, with Junior Negrao replacing Bjorn Johnsen.
Gi Dong Kim is making the team's third substitution at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium with Lee Kwang-hyeok replacing Shim Dong-un.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 76, Byung jin Park awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Pohang Steelers.
The home team have replaced Chung-Yong Lee with Lee Dong-kyeong. This is the second substitution made today by Kim Do-Hoon.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Ulsan Hyundai defence as Aleksandar Palocevic fires in a strike for Pohang Steelers.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Byung jin Park.
Stanislav Iljutcenko (Pohang Steelers) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 81, Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hong Chul for Ulsan Hyundai who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Hong Chul is back on the pitch.
In the minute 83, Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kim Do-Hoon (Ulsan Hyundai) has taken off Hong Chul who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Joo-ho Park is the replacement.
Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
Byung jin Park signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Aleksandar Palocevic of Pohang Steelers gets in a strike, but is off target.
Byung jin Park awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
